item.description:
Please join me for a drink at Daedalus!

I should be there between 5:30pm to 6pm and I'll stay for a couple of hours. Feel free to come and go as you please.

Please maintain your own tab or pay as you go. There will be no group tab because people will be arriving and leaving at different times.

Check out their website for more info:

http://www.daedalusha...

Parking is a pain in this area. The best way to get there is to take the Red Line to Harvard Square.

Please wear something GREEN!

It'll be easier to find the group if everyone wears the color GREEN!!!

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a GREEN shirt. I'm asking everyone to wear GREEN. So, look for a group of people wearing GREEN!!!
item.why: To have a drink in GREEN clothing!
item.name: Upstairs Bar at Daedalus - Wear GREEN!!!
